Appointment Class Documentation¶

class src.Appointment.Appointment(patient, date, time, duration)[source]¶

Each slot in the Day’s schedule

Parameters:
  • patient – the patient who scheduled it
  • time – the time it was scheduled for
  • duration – the length of the visit
